summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mallorca Golf promotional website with multi-language support. All major features tested including backend APIs, frontend UI components, external redirects, language switching, and contact form submission.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 405 status for CORS preflight requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - actual API calls work correctly

ui_bugs.issue: Slight delay in dropdown option selection with Playwright automation
ui_bugs.note: Functionality works correctly for users, only automation timing issue

passed_tests: Backend API /api/golf-courses returns 4 courses with multi-language descriptions
Backend API /api/partner-offers returns hotels and restaurants with filtering
Backend API /api/contact accepts POST requests and creates inquiries
Hero section 'Book Tee Time' button redirects to https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com
Navigation 'Book Now' button redirects to external booking platform
Language selector switches between EN, DE, FR, SE with content updates
Hotels section displays 3 hotel partner cards with 'Book Now' buttons
Restaurants section displays 3 restaurant cards with 'Reserve Table' buttons
Contact form submission works (name, email, phone, country, message)
Navigation smooth scrolling to all sections (about, courses, hotels, restaurants, contact)
Golf courses section displays 4 courses with external booking links
Multi-language content updates correctly for German, French, Swedish
All external links open in new tabs with correct URLs
Contact form shows success message after submission
